name: Get That Bread (itch) (Delpire)
description:
Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #51. A peaceful farming game. Grow wheat and make bread. Sell that bread to buy some upgrades so that you can produce more bread at a faster pace!

Note: The Linux build has not been tested and I cannot provide a MacOS build. Please use the browser versions if using Mac or Linux.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • E - Enter and exit builds and to advance to the next day when at the house.
  • Space - Use the scythe. Must be unlocked.
  • Hold Shift - Run. Must be unlocked.
  • Click to interact with most things.
